An Inverted World

27 Mar 2018 An Inverted World

An Inverted World

Flowers bloom No sign of gloom But I hold an inverted world.

Flowers bloom
No sign of gloom
But I hold an inverted world.

Gravity holds us tight
Everything seems so right
But I hold an inverted world.

Elements are same
All colors look plainÂ 
Cause I hold an inverted world.

Its upside down
My life, My town
Cause I hold an inverted world.

By Divya Godayal on March 27, 2018.
